title: Human Protein Variant
description: Schema for submitting a human protein variant.

rsid.title: Variant ID
rsid.description: An external ID for the variant like dbSNP.
rsid.comment: This is currently only accepting rsIDs.

chromosome.title: Chromosome
chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the chromosome, e.g. chr1 or chrX.

refseq_id.title: RefSeq Identifier
refseq_id.description: The RefSeq identifier for this variant. If there is no RefSeq identifier available for this variant, the seqeunce should be used instead.
